title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6210.6 - Personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6210.6 - Personnel

State Regulations

It is the responsibility of the county board to provide
sufficient and appropriate staff to perform the functions required for
successful use of the voting system. All tasks shall be defined in written
procedures, and personnel assigned shall be thoroughly trained to carry out
their responsibilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6210.6

Amended, New

York State Register May 21, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 20, eff. 5/21/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
